iti sarga ādya kāṇḍasya paricchedaḥ tathā ādimaḥ
artha abhivyaktaye śabda sphoṭa vāda nirūpaṇam

anitya mata doṣaḥ ca prasiddha mata nirṇayaḥ

amāvāsyā ādi udbhavaḥ ca nakṣatra vṛkṣa nirṇayaḥ

iti aṅkura pariccheda dvitīyasya samāpanam

original: teṣāṃ rūpāṇi sthānāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak |

patra ārūḍha akṣara tanu nidānam ca lipi kramaḥ
akāra ādi kṣakāra anta varṇānām daivataiḥ saha
bhūmau lipi niṣedha ādi lekhanī niyamaḥ tatas
pustakasya tatas mānam pustaka chidra nirṇayaḥ
pustikā patra nirṇītiḥ veda lekhana nindanam
yuga bheda ikṣare deva bhedaḥ lekhana pūjanam
ārambha ādau lekhakasya vetana graha dūṣaṇam
iti koraka viccheda saptamasya samāpanam
oṃkāra ādi kṣakāra anta nāmāni kusumāni ca
tantra saṅketa kārīṇi aṣṭama cheda samāpanam
pañcavaktra udbhavāḥ mantrāḥ tantra ādi śāstram eva ca
gaṇeśena sarva tantra vistāra karaṇam tatas
tathā aṣṭa daśa vidyānām darśanānām ca nirṇayaḥ
īśvarasya śakti samāveśāt śāstra ādi kartṛ tā
manuṣya prabhṛtīnām ca śāstra kartṛ nirūpaṇam
ānvīkṣikī ādi nirṇītiḥ gṛhiṇām na tu mānasam
pāpam īśaḥ dvidhā ātmānam akarot tasya kāraṇam
tantra avatāra vījañca pañcavaktra āhvayaḥ tathā
pañcavaktrasya rūpam ca pañca āmnāya nirūpaṇam
ṣaṣ āmnāyasya kathanam āmnāya bheda devatā
āmnāyānām phalam ca eva tathā āśu phala nirṇayaḥ
āmnāya bheda mantrāṇām ācāra ādi nirūpaṇam
mantra vidyā vibhāgaḥ ca devatā bhedataḥ tathā
strī pum napuṃsaka tvañca mantrāṇām ṣaṭsu karmasu
iti keśara viccheda navamasya samāpanam  /
chinna ādi doṣa nirṇītiḥ mantrāṇām tad pratikriyā
mahāmudrā lakṣaṇam ca yonimudrā ākṛtiḥ tathā
kaṇṭhāsana lakṣaṇam ca ṣaṭcakra iṣṭa smṛtiḥ yathā
sahasrāra ambuje dhyānam iṣṭadevyāḥ tatas param
punar mūlādhāra padma ādiṣu cintā kramaḥ tathā
mantra akṣarasya cit śaktau prota anantara karma yat
tat phalam saṃvatsareṇa abhyāsāt siddhiḥ anuttamā
asaktasya yonimudrā karaṇe tu japa kramaḥ
bhūta lipi nidhānam ca tasyāḥ ṛṣi ādi nirṇayaḥ
dhyānam bhūtalipeḥ prāṇa pratiṣṭhā tad anantaram
varṇa nyāsaḥ pūjanam ca nava āvṛttayaḥ eva ca
homaḥ ca kāmanā bhedāt bhūta lipyā puṭīkṛtaḥ
sahasra kṛtvas sañjaptaḥ māsa mātram yadā tadā
vīja nāmāni vījānām bhūtaḍāmara sammatam
nāmadheyam idam vyoma pariccheda samāpanam
yat yat tantrasāra kāraiḥ asmat vaṃśa abja bhāskaraiḥ

original: tena tatra tatra sūryarūpo'kāro brahmā atra tu sūryarūpo viṣṇuriti
analyzed: tena tatra tatra sūrya rūpa ukāraḥ brahmā atra tu sūrya rūpaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti

original: pūrvāparalikhanānusāreṇa virodha iti cedarthasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa kramo'nusandheyo na tu
analyzed: pūrva apara likhana anusāreṇa virodhaḥ iti ced artha sṛṣṭi anusāreṇa kramaḥ anusandheyaḥ na tu
likhana anusāreṇa iti sthitam
yoginītantre pūrva khaṇḍe daśama paṭale tu
iti uktvā sā mahākālī dadau asmāsu śāmbhavi

original: icchā tu viṣṇave dattā kriyā śaktistu brahmaṇe |
analyzed: icchā tu viṣṇave dattā kriyā śaktiḥ tu brahmaṇe
mahyam dattā jñānaśaktiḥ sarva śakti svarūpiṇī
iti anena viṣṇoḥ icchā śaktiḥ iti yat uktam tat āmnāya bhedena aviruddham
evam vakṣyamāṇa pañca āmnāya ṣaṣ āmnāya tad tad āmnyāya
rūpa ādi nirūpaka prabhṛti paraspara viruddha vacanāni sāttvika ādi bhedena āmnāya bhedena vā
vyavastheyāni iti
nirvāṇa tantre prathama paṭale tu
satyaloke nirākārā mahā jyotiḥ svarūpiṇī
māyā valkalam utsṛjya dvidhā bhinnā jagat mayī
śiva śakti vibhāgena jāyate sṛṣṭi kalpanā

original: prathame jāyate putro brahmasaṃjño hi pārvati ! |
analyzed: prathame jāyate putraḥ brahma saṃjñaḥ hi pārvati
kālikā uvāca

original: śṛṇu putra ! māhāvīra ! vivāhaṃ kuru yatnataḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇu putra māhāvīra vivāham kuru yatnataḥ

original: etat śrutvā tato brahmā uvāca sādaraṃ vacaḥ |
analyzed: etat śrutvā tatas brahmā uvāca sādaram vacaḥ

original: tvāṃ vinā jananī nāsti śaktiṃ me dehi sundari ! |
analyzed: tvām vinā jananī nā asti śaktim me dehi sundari

original: tat śrutvā jagatāṃ mātā svadehāt mohinīṃ dadau |
analyzed: tat śrutvā jagatām mātā sva dehāt mohinīm dadau

original: p. 15) dvitīyā sā mahāvidyā sāvitrī paramā kalā |
analyzed: dvitīyā sā mahāvidyā sāvitrī paramā kalā
asyāḥ saṅgam samāsādya veda vistāraṇam kuru
anāyāse sṛṣṭi kartā bhava tvam mahi maṇḍale
dvitīye jāyate putraḥ viṣṇuḥ sattva guṇa āśrayaḥ
kālikā uvāca
śṛṇu putra mahāvīra vivāham kuru yatnataḥ
viṣṇuḥ uvāca
tava darśana mātreṇa niṣkāmī jāyate pumān

original: kāthaṃ karomi he māta ! mohinīṃ dehi me śive |
analyzed: kātham karomi he māta mohinīm dehi me śive
dehāt śaktim viniṣkṛṣya dadau
tasmai ca kālikā
vaiṣṇavīm tām mahāvidyām śrīvidyām parameśvari
tām āśritya mahā viṣṇuḥ pālayati akhilam jagat
tṛtīye jāyate putraḥ mahā yogī sadāśivaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā sā mahākālī ṛtu yuktā abhavat mudā

original: śṛṇu putra ! mahāyogin ! madvākyaṃ hṛdayaṃ kuru |
analyzed: śṛṇu putra mahā yogin mad vākyam hṛdayam kuru

original: tvāṃ vinā puruṣaḥ ko vā māṃ vinā kāpi mohinī |
analyzed: tvām vinā puruṣaḥ kaḥ vā mām vinā kā api mohinī

original: atastvaṃ paramānando vivāhaṃ kuru me śiva ! |
analyzed: atas tvam parama ānandaḥ vivāham kuru me śiva
sadāśivaḥ uvāca

original: yaduktaṃ karma he mātastvāṃ vinā nāsti mohinī |
analyzed: yat uktam karma he mātar tvām vinā nā asti mohinī

original: satyametat jaganmāta ! rmāṃ vinā puruṣo na ca |
analyzed: satyam etat jaganmāta rmām vinā puruṣaḥ na ca

original: asmin dehe saṃsthite ca na karomi vivāhakam |
analyzed: asmin dehe saṃsthite ca na karomi vivāhakam

original: kuru dehāntaraṃ mātaḥ karuṇā yadi varttate |
analyzed: kuru deha antaram mātar karuṇā yadi varttate
tad kṣaṇe sā mahākālī dadau bhuvanasundarīm iti
kubjikātantre prathama paṭale

original: brahmāṇī kurute sṛṣṭiṃ na tu brahmā kadācana |
analyzed: brahmāṇī kurute sṛṣṭim na tu brahmā kadācana

original: ata eva maheśāni ! brahmā preto na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: atas eva maheśāni brahmā pretaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavī kurute rakṣāṃ na tu viṣṇuḥ kadācana |
analyzed: vaiṣṇavī kurute rakṣām na tu viṣṇuḥ kadācana

original: ata eva maheśāni ! viṣṇuḥ preto na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: atas eva maheśāni viṣṇuḥ pretaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: rudrāṇī kurute grāsaṃ na tu rudraḥ kadācana |
analyzed: rudrāṇī kurute grāsam na tu rudraḥ kadācana

original: ata eva maheśāni ! rudraḥ preto na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: atas eva maheśāni rudraḥ pretaḥ na saṃśayaḥ
brahma viṣṇu maheśa ādyāḥ jaḍāḥ ca eva prakīrtitāḥ
prakṛtim ca vinā devi sarva kārya akṣamā dhruvam iti uktam
iti śaktyā sṛṣṭi ādi kathanam
śabdabrahmaṇaḥ utpattim āha
śāradāyām prathama paṭale
bhidyamānāt parāt vindoḥ avyakta ātmā varaḥ bhavat
śabdabrahma iti tam prāhuḥ sarva āgama viśāradāḥ iti
parāt vindoḥ iti anena yaḥ
binduḥ tasmāt bhidyamānāt avyakta ātmā varṇa ādi viśeṣa rahitaḥ ukhaṇḍaḥ
nāda mātram utpannam iti arthaḥ

original: p. 16) uktañcadurgeṇa yatra dhvanāvakārādayo varṇā viśeṣarūpeṇa na vyajyante sa
analyzed: yatra dhvanau akāra ādayaḥ varṇāḥ viśeṣa rūpeṇa na vyajyante sa
dhvaniḥ avyaktaḥ iti
sṛṣṭi unmukha paramaśiva prathama ullāsa mātram akhaṇḍaḥ vyaktaḥ nādabindu mayaḥ eva
brahma ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ

original: śabdabrahmeti hṛdayaṃ tathā ca rāghavabhaṭṭadhṛtaṃ vacanam |
analyzed: śabdabrahma iti hṛdayam tathā ca rāghavabhaṭṭa dhṛtam vacanam
kriyā śakti pradhānāyāḥ śabda śabda artha kāraṇam
prakṛteḥ bindu rūpiṇyāḥ śabdabrahma abhavat param iti
prayogasāre pi

original: so'ntarātmā tadā devi ! nādātmā nadate svayam |
analyzed: saḥ u ntarātmā tadā devi nāda ātmā nadate svayam
yathā saṃsthāna bhedena sambhūya varṇa tām gataḥ
vāyunā preryamāṇā asau piṇḍāt vyaktim prayāsyati iti
śāradātilake
caitanyam sarva bhūtānām śabdabrahma iti me matam
tat prāpya kuṇḍalī rūpam prāṇinām deha madhya gam
varṇa ātmanā āvirbhavati gadya padya ādi bhedataḥ

original: tadbhidyamāna bindurūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kuṇḍalīsvarūpaṃ praṇavākāraṃ prāṇināṃ
analyzed: tat bhidyamāna bindu rūpam caitanyam kuṇḍalī svarūpam praṇava ākāram prāṇinām

original: dehamadhyagaṃ sat varṇātmanā āvirbhavati prakāśata ityanvayaḥ |
analyzed: deha madhya gam sat varṇa ātmanā āvirbhavati prakāśate iti anvayaḥ
kim kṛtvā prāpya kaṇṭha ādi karaṇāni iti śeṣaḥ

original: tathā ca mūlādhārāt prathamamudito yastu tāraḥ parākhya ityādi prapañcasāre
analyzed: tathā ca mūlādhārāt prathamam uditaḥ yaḥ tu tāraḥ para ākhyaḥ ityādi prapañcasāre
āścaryaḥ vakṣyati

original: ata eva vakṣyamāṇā sṛṣṭiḥ kuṇḍalīta iti jñeyam |
analyzed: atas eva vakṣyamāṇā sṛṣṭiḥ kuṇḍalītaḥ iti jñeyam
śabdabrahma paramabrahma bhedena brahmaṇaḥ dvaividhyam uktam kulārṇave pañcama khaṇḍe
prathama ullāse
āgama uttham viveka uttham dvidhā jñānam pracakṣate
śabdabrahma āgama nayam param brahma viveka jam
śrī bhāgavate ṣaṣṭha skandhe ṣoḍaśa adhyāye pi
aham sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūta ātmā bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: śabdabrahma paraṃ brahma mamobhe śāśvatī tanuriti |
analyzed: śabdabrahma param brahma mama ubhe śāśvatī tanuḥ iti
śabdabrahma paraṇava rūpam tathā ca bhagavadgītā
om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran

original: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatimiti |
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim iti

original: omiti dhvanimātropalakṣaṇamato vakṣyamāṇaguruvaktre sthitaṃ brahma labhyate |
analyzed: om iti dhvani mātra upalakṣaṇam atas vakṣyamāṇa guru vaktre sthitam brahma labhyate
tad prasādataḥ ityādi vacanaiḥ saha na virodhaḥ
sarvatra eva dhavaneḥ vidyamāna tvāt

original: p. 17) praṇavārtho vā vācyantu paramaṃ brahmapraṇavo vācakaḥ smṛta ityādivacanāt |
analyzed: praṇava arthaḥ vā vācyantu paramam brahma praṇavaḥ vācakaḥ smṛtaḥ ityādi vacanāt
iti śrī prāṇatoṣiṇyām prathama kāṇḍe bīja svarūpa śabda prādurbhāva rūpa ākara kathanam
nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: ityākare samudbhūte śabde saṃśayarūpataḥ vivādabilamutpannaṃ parasparajigīṣayeti |
analyzed: iti ākare samudbhūte śabde saṃśaya rūpataḥ vivāda bilam utpannam paraspara jigīṣayā iti

original: atha śabdā nityā anityāḥ prasiddhāśceti matatrayam |
analyzed: atha śabdāḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ prasiddhāḥ ca iti mata trayam
tatra pūrva mate śabdabrahma iti muṣṭhu uktam
anitya vādinaḥ api bahavaḥ teṣām madhye āntara sphoṭa vādinaḥ
jāti vyakti sphoṭa ātmaka vāhya sphoṭa vādinaḥ ca evam vivadante yathā atha katham arthaḥ
śabdena pratipādyate pratipādayitum akṣama tvāt

original: tathā hi niyatavarṇāḥ pradārthaṃ gamayanti te kiṃ krameṇa yugapadvā |
analyzed: tathā hi niyata varṇāḥ pradārtham gamayanti te kim krameṇa yugapad vā
na ādyaḥ

original: gaurityādau gādivarṇaiḥ pratyekamarthapratipādane kṛte aparavarṇavaiyarthyaṃ syāt |
analyzed: gauḥ ityādau ga ādi varṇaiḥ pratyekam artha pratipādane kṛte apara varṇa vaiyarthyam syāt

original: atha varṇairekaśaḥ kiyānarthāvayavaḥ pratipādyata iti cettadapyayuktam |
analyzed: atha varṇaiḥ ekaśas kiyān artha avayavaḥ pratipādyate iti ced tat api ayuktam
na hi gavādi avayave ga ādi varṇānām saṅketaḥ usti
na dvitīyaḥ
bhinna kāla upalabdhānām yaugapadya abhāvāt
uccarita pradhvaṃsinaḥ hi varṇāḥ tāvatkālam avatiṣṭhante

original: na ca pūrvapūrvavarṇajñānaṃ tasyottarottaravarṇajñānānuvṛttau nityatve prasaṅgāt ata
analyzed: na ca pūrva pūrva varṇa jñānam tasya uttara uttara varṇa jñāna anuvṛttau nitya tve prasaṅgāt
eva idam nirastam
yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ ye ca tad artha pratipādane
varṇāḥ prajñāta sāmarthyāḥ te tathā eva artha bodhakāḥ iti
tasmāt anutpanna utpanna naṣṭayoḥ asattve viśeṣa abhāvāt varṇebhyaḥ ṛtha pratyayaḥ na
sambhavati iti varṇa a vyatirekeṇa varṇa abhivyaṅgaḥ sphoṭaḥ parikalpyate
sphuṭati arthaḥ yasmāt iti
varṇa uccāraṇantu sphoṭa artham eva

original: pādavarṇā hi sphoṭavyañjakā iti kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ vyañjakāsambhava iti
analyzed: pāda varṇāḥ hi sphoṭa vyañjakāḥ iti krama yaugapadyābhyām vyañjaka asambhavaḥ iti

original: cedbhavati tāvadarthapratipattiḥ tadanupapattyā varṇeṣvapi sphoṭaḥ kalpyate |
analyzed: ced bhavati tāvat artha pratipattiḥ tad anupapattyā varṇeṣu api sphoṭaḥ kalpyate
tasmāt varṇa sphoṭāt pada sphoṭaḥ tasmāt artha pratipattiḥ ittham ca krama yaugapadyābhyām
padebhyaḥ vākya artha anupapattyā pada sphoṭa vyañjitāt vākya sphotāt vākya artha pratītiḥ

original: p. 18) nanu gaurityuccāraṇānantaraṃ varṇavyatiriktaṃ paraṃ kiñcinnopalabhāmahe |
analyzed: nanu gauḥ iti uccāraṇa anantaram varṇa vyatiriktam param kiñcid na upalabhāmahe
kevalam varṇāḥ eva pratipādyante
tasmāt anupalabhyamāna tvāt sphoṭa rūpam nāma na asti eva śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat iti
sphoṭa vādinam ākṣipanti
śapathaiḥ api nā ādeyam vacaḥ vaḥ sphoṭa vādinām
nabhaḥ kusumam asti iti sa cetanaḥ iti
tatra sphoṭa vādibhiḥ ucyate
pratyakṣeṇa na gṛhyate sphoṭaḥ

original: tathā hi gaurityatra gakāraukāravisargeti varṇatrayasya krameṇānubhavānantaraṃ padamiti
analyzed: tathā hi gauḥ iti atra gakāra aukāra visarga iti varṇa trayasya krameṇa anubhava anantaram padam iti
abhinna ākārā buddhiḥ upajāyate

original: na ca tasyāṃ varṇatrayānarthakyaṃ prayujyate abhinnatvāt buddheḥ |
analyzed: na ca tasyām varṇa traya ānarthakyam prayujyate abhinna tvāt buddheḥ
yathā paṭa buddhiḥ abhinnā tantubhiḥ eva upajāyamānā tantu vyatiriktam paṭam avalambate

original: tathā ihāpi varṇatrayavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaramavalambate sa ca sphoṭa iti |
analyzed: tathā iha api varṇa traya vyatiriktam vastu antaram avalambate sa ca sphoṭaḥ iti

original: nanu varṇavyatiriktamanyadvastu na dṛśyata eva paṭo'pi tarhi tantuvyatirikto na dṛśyate
analyzed: nanu varṇa vyatiriktam anyat vastu na dṛśyate eva paṭaḥ api tarhi tantu vyatiriktaḥ na dṛśyate

original: kathamaṅgīkarttavyaḥ paṭabuddhau paṭaḥ prakāśate sphoṭo'pi tarhi tathā |
analyzed: katham aṅgīkarttavyaḥ paṭa buddhau paṭaḥ prakāśate sphoṭaḥ api tarhi tathā

original: atha sphoṭaḥ kiṃsvarūpa idaṃ taditi śṛṅgagrāhitayā pratipādyatām |
analyzed: atha sphoṭaḥ kiṃsvarūpaḥ idam tat iti śṛṅgagrāhi tayā pratipādyatām
atha ucyate

original: yo hi yadbuddhigrāhyaḥ sa tadbuddhibodhya eva na buddhyantarebhya iti paṭo'pi tarhi
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad buddhi grāhyaḥ sa tad buddhi bodhyaḥ eva na buddhi antarebhyaḥ iti paṭaḥ api tarhi
taṭa buddhyā eva pratipādyate
na tu buddhi antareṇa tasmāt
yathā tantu anubhava anantaram avayavī pratyakṣa siddhaḥ paṭaḥ tadvat
sakala varṇa anubhava anantaram anubhūyamānaḥ varṇa abhivyaṅgyaḥ
pratyakṣa siddha sphoṭaḥ iti gopīnātha tarka ācāryāḥ
tad mata dvayam dūṣayitum upakramante śāradātilake prathama paṭale ācāryāḥ
śabdabrahma iti śabda artham śabdam ityam pare viduḥ
eke ācāryāḥ
śabda artham āntara sphoṭam śabdabrahma iti āhuḥ
yathā āha

original: niraṃśa eva abhinnonityabodhasvabhāvaḥ śabdārtha āntarasphoṭa iti |
analyzed: niraṃśaḥ eva abhinnaḥ nitya bodha svabhāvaḥ śabda arthaḥ āntara sphoṭaḥ iti
apare vaiyākaraṇāḥ pūrva pūrva varṇa uccāraṇa abhivyakta tad tad pada
saṃskāra sahāya carama pada grahaṇa udbuddham vākya sphoṭa lakṣaṇa
makhaṇḍa eka artha prakāśakam śabdam śabdabrahma iti vadanti
yathā āha

original: eka eva nityo'bhivyaṅgyebhyo'khaṇḍo vyaktisphoṭo jātisphoṭo vā vahīrūpa iti |
analyzed: ekaḥ eva nityaḥ ubhivyaṅgyebhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ vyakti sphoṭaḥ jāti sphoṭaḥ vā vahī rūpaḥ iti

original: p. 19) na tu anityaḥśabdaścettadā nānāmunibhirmahādevena devyarcanānānāśāstreṣu
analyzed: na tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ ced tadā nānā munibhiḥ mahādevena devī arcana nānā śāstreṣu

original: ekameva vacanaṃ kvacit kvacit kathamuktaṃ tadagre vyaktībhaviṣyati |
analyzed: ekam eva vacanam kvacid kvacid katham uktam tat agre vyaktībhaviṣyati

original: nityapakṣe tu naiṣa doṣo vacanasyāpi nityatvāt iti cet na |
analyzed: nitya pakṣe tu nā eṣa doṣaḥ vacanasya api nitya tvāt iti ced na
anitya pakṣe api nānā vaktrāt eka svarūpā bhāratī vacana rūpeṇa nirgatā iti anena
kasya aparādhaḥ tasyāḥ śakteḥ vaicitryāt
yat tu yoginītantre prathama khaṇḍe daśama paṭale

original: tanmadhye tu mayā dṛṣṭaṃ varṇapuñjaṃ mahojjvalam |
analyzed: tad madhye tu mayā dṛṣṭam varṇa puñjam mahā ujjvalam
sūrya koṭi sama ābhāsam candra koṭi su śītalam
vahni koṭi mahā ujjvālam param brahma mayam dhruvam iti vacanam
tat brahmāṇḍa ādi vat ādya aśarīra stha tvena avadhātavyam anyathā tad śarīra varttinām
brahmāṇḍa ādīnām api nityam syāt
tad śarīre brahma aṇḍantu
atīva vṛhat ākāra brahmāṇḍa koṭi koṭayaḥ

original: caranti sarvadā devi ! kaḥ saṃkhyātuṃ kṣamo bhavet |
analyzed: caranti sarvadā devi kaḥ saṃkhyātum kṣamaḥ bhavet
iti tad anantara śiva vacanāt jñeyam
atha bhavat mate mantra veda gāyatrī ādīnām anitya tva āpattiḥ iṣṭa āpattiḥ iti ced
om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
iti gītā uktam
guru vaktve sthitam brahma labhyate tad prasādata
iti gurugīta uktam

original: guruṇā yasya yat proktaṃ tattasya brahmasaṃjñitam |
analyzed: guruṇā yasya yat proktam tat tasya brahma saṃjñitam
iti guptasādhanatantre ṣaṣṭha paṭala uktam
gāyatrī brahma rūpiṇī iti tat kavaca uktam āpauruṣeyāṇi veda vākyāni iti durgasiṃha uktam ca

original: uktañca doṣāḥ santi na santīti pauruṣeyeṣu vidyate |
analyzed: uktam ca doṣāḥ santi na santi iti pauruṣeyeṣu vidyate
vede karttuḥ abhāvāt tu doṣa āśaṅkā eva nā asti naḥ

original: iti tatra tatra lakṣaṇayā brahmapratipādakamiti vyākhyātavyamiti cenneyaṃ lakṣaṇā
analyzed: iti tatra tatra lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādakam iti vyākhyātavyam iti ced nā iyam lakṣaṇā
rūḍhi prayojanābhyām vañcita tvāt iti
uktañca kāvyaḥprakāśe

pavana ādyāḥ pṛthivī antāḥ sparśa ādyaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ saha
karaṇāni api catvāri saṅghātaḥ cetanā iti ca

original: hakārasya guṇāḥ proktāḥ ṣaḍiti kramato budhaiḥ |
analyzed: hakārasya guṇāḥ proktāḥ ṣaṭ iti kramatas budhaiḥ
ukāra antāḥ tu akāra ādyāḥ ṣaṣ varṇāḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ eva tu

ṛkāra ādyāḥ ca catvāraḥ repha utthāḥ ca parāḥ smṛtāḥ
ekāra ādi visarga antam varṇānām ṣaṭkam uddhṛtam
hakārasya ṣaṣ aṅgebhyaḥ iti idam ṣoḍaśa aṅgavat
ebhyaḥ sañjajñire iṅgebhyaḥ svarāḥ ṣoḍaśa sarva gāḥ

original: tebhyo varṇāntarāḥ sarve tato mūlamidaṃ viduḥ |
analyzed: tebhyaḥ varṇa antarāḥ sarve tatas mūlam idam viduḥ
sa tāraḥ vīja tām eva prāṇiṣu eva vyavasthitaḥ
brahmāṇḍam grantham etena vyāptam sthāvara saṅgamam
nādaḥ prāṇāḥ ca jīvaḥ ca ghoṣaḥ ca ityādi kathyate
eṣa pum straḥ niyamitaiḥ liṅgaiḥ ca sa napuṃsakaiḥ

original: p. 30) repho māyā bījamiti tridhā māyābhidhīyate |

pum prakṛti ātmakaḥ haṃsaḥ tad ātmakam idam jagat

original: p. 31) sa eva paramaṃ brahmakūṭastho jagadaṅkuraḥ |

yasmin sṛṣṭiḥ sadā eva eti yasmin adya api tiṣṭhati

original: sa eva paramaṃ brahma so'haṃbhāvena jāyate |
analyzed: saḥ eva paramam brahma saḥ ohaṃbhāvena jāyate
saha varṇau vilupya atha sandhi varṇam
praṇavaḥ sarva varṇeṣu kathitaḥ padmayoninā
ātmanaḥ deha madhye tu sarva mantra ātmakam priye
iti rudrajāmale uttara khaṇḍe dvāviṃśati paṭale ca
eka mūrtiḥ trayaḥ devāḥ brahma viṣṇi maheśvarāḥ

praṇavāt udbhavāḥ ete yoga vighna karāḥ sadā
akāram brahmaṇaḥ varṇam śabda rūpam mahā prabham

original: praṇavājjāyate haṃso haṃsaḥ so'haṃ paro bhavet |

original: nirantaraṃ bhāvayedyaḥ sa eva paramo bhavet |
analyzed: nirantaram bhāvayet yaḥ saḥ eva paramaḥ bhavet

original: haṃ pumān sa svarūpeṇa candreṇa prakṛtistu saḥ |
analyzed: haṃ pumān sa sva rūpeṇa candreṇa prakṛtiḥ tu saḥ
etat haṃsam vijānīyāt sūrya maṇḍala bhedakam
viparīta krameṇa eva sohaṃjñām yadā bhavet

sandhim kuryāt tatas paścāt praṇavaḥ usau mahā manuḥ
iti praṇavataḥ sarveṣām akṣara ādīnām āvirbhāva darśanāt ca

original: ata eva sarvajīvotpādaka iti varṇābhidhāne pravaṇavasya nāma vakṣyati ||
analyzed: atas eva sarva jīva utpādakaḥ iti varṇa abhidhāne pravaṇavasya nāma vakṣyati

original: atha praṇavasya brahmavācakatvaṃ na tu brahmatvamuktam sṛṣṭiprapañcastu
analyzed: atha praṇavasya brahma vācaka tvam na tu brahma tvam uktam sṛṣṭi prapañcaḥ tu
akāra ukāra makāra nāda bindu rūpa praṇava avayava pañcaka vācya brahma viṣṇu rudra śakti īśvarebhyaḥ
aḥ eva iti

original: p. 32) ata eva samastaṃ vyastaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇada ! gṛṇātyomiti padamiti
analyzed: atas eva samastam vyastam tvām śaraṇa da gṛṇāti om iti padam iti
puṣpadantena api uktam

original: anyatrāpi pācyantu paramaṃ brahma praṇavo vācakaḥ smṛtaḥ iti |

tunda madhya gataḥ prāṇaḥ tāni kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak
pṛthakkaraṇa prakāraḥ tu yogiyājñavalkye
punar agnauḥ jalam prāpya anna ādīni jala upari

original: svayaṃ hyapānaḥ samprāpya tenaiva saha mārutaḥ |
analyzed: svayam hi apānaḥ samprāpya tena eva saha mārutaḥ
prayāti jvalanam tatra deha madhya gatam punar

original: agnau jalaṃ prāpayya annādīni jalopari samprāpayya tenaiva prāṇavāyunaivāpāno
analyzed: agnau jalam prāpayya anna ādīni jala upari samprāpayya tena eva prāṇa vāyunā eva apānaḥ
vāyuḥ deha madhya gatam jvalanam prayāti prāpnoti iti anvayaḥ

original: evañca prāṇena preritamiti prāṇasthityeti ca prādhānyena vakṣyate |
analyzed: evam ca prāṇena preritam iti prāṇa sthityā iti ca prādhānyena vakṣyate
vastutas tu prāṇa apānābhyām eva preritam iti arthaḥ
vāyunā varddhate vahniḥ apānena śanais śanais
tatas jvalati vipra indri sva kule deha madhyake
jvālābhiḥ jvalanam tatra prāṇena preritam tatas
jvalati udakam āśritya koṣṭha madhya gatam tadā
annam vyañjana saṃyuktam jala upari samarpitam
tatas suṣuptam akarot vahni santapta vāriṇā
yoga arṇave ca
agneḥ ūrddham jalam sthāpya tad annam ca jala upari

original: jalasyādhaḥ svayaṃ prāṇaḥ sthitvā svedayate śanaiḥ |
analyzed: jalasya adhas svayam prāṇaḥ sthitvā svedayate śanais
vāyunā vyuhyamāna ugniḥ ati uṣṇam kurute jalam
annam tat uṣṇa toyena samantāt pacyate punar

original: dvidhā bhavati tatpakvaṃ pṛthak kīṭṭaṃ pṛthagrasam ||
analyzed: dvidhā bhavati tat pakvam pṛthak kīṭṭam pṛthak rasam
kīṭṭam malam
tatra rasa utpatti prakāraḥ tu prapañcasāre dvitīya paṭale
atha āhṛtam ṣaṣ rasam vā api āhāram kaṇṭha mārga gam
śleṣmaṇā anugatam tasya prabhāvāt madhurībhavet
tatra svādu amla lavaṇa tikta ūṣaṇa kaṣāyakāḥ
ṣaṭ rasāḥ kathitāḥ bhūta vikṛtyā dravyam āśritāḥ
svādum iṣṭam uṣaṇam kaṭu
tathā evam āśaya gatam paścāt pittāśayam vrajet
āśayam chidram
tadā tasya anugamanāt kaṭuka tvam prapadyate
tathā atra antara saṃśliṣṭam pacyate pitta vāriṇā
jala ādīnām pākena avasthā antaram uktam yogiyājñavalkye

original: svedamūtre jalaṃ syātāṃ vīryarūpaṃ raso bhavet |
analyzed: sveda mūtre jalam syātām vīrya rūpam rasaḥ bhavet

original: purīṣamannaṃ syādgārgi ! prāṇaḥ kuryyāt pṛthak pṛthak ||
analyzed: purīṣam annam syāt gārgi prāṇaḥ kuryyāt pṛthak pṛthak
grahaṇī nāma sā pātrī prasṛta añjali sannibhā
pātrī nāḍī

original: adhastasyāḥ pradhānāgniḥ samānenāpi nudyate sthānametaddhi mūlādhāraṃ
analyzed: adhas tasyāḥ pradhāna agniḥ samānena api nudyate sthānam etat hi mūlādhāram
viduḥ budhāḥ
pradhāna agniḥ doṣa dūṣya stha agnibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ vaḍavānala rūpejaṭharāgniḥ iti prasiddhaḥ
tathā ca
pacyamānāt rasam bhinnam vāyū rakta ādikam nayet

original: tatra kīṭṭaḥ pṛthak bhinnaṃ grahaṇyāṃ cinute'nilaḥ |
analyzed: tatra kīṭṭaḥ pṛthak bhinnam grahaṇyām
tat cīyamānam viṇāma grahaṇīm pūrayet muhur
sā tayā śakṛtā pūrṇā abali tām pratimuñcati
śakṛtā malena
pūrīṣam pāyu mārgeṇa tad pāke ca ambhasaḥ tatas
aṅga sveda vat abhyantar vyāptaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ śivā mukhaiḥ
vastim āpūrayet vāyuḥ pūrṇaḥ muñcati dhārayā
mūtrāśayaḥ dhanuḥ vakraḥ vastiḥ iti abhidhīyate
mūtram iti āhuḥ udakam vasteḥ ca anila nirgatam
apathya bhājām anayoḥ mārgayoḥ doṣa duṣṭayoḥ
prameha mūtrakakṛcchā ādeḥ grahiṇī ādeḥ ca sambhavaḥ
rāghava bhaṭṭa dhṭa suśrute
tvak asṛj māṃsa medaḥ asthi majjā śukrān dhātāḥ

original: p. 53) bhavantyanyonyataḥ sarve pācitāḥ pittatejasā iti |
analyzed: bhavanti anyonyatas sarve pācitāḥ pitta tejasā iti
etena pūrva pūrvasya uttara uttaram prati kāraṇa tvam uktam
tathā ca tatra eva
rasaḥ sa nāḍī madhya sthaḥ śārīreṇa ūṣmaṇā bhṛśam
pacyate pacyamānāt ca bhavet pāka dvayam punar
carma āveṣṭya samantāt ca rudhiram tu prajāyate

original: rasena tena tā nāḍīḥ prāṇaḥ pūrayate śanaiḥ |
analyzed: rasena tena tāḥ nāḍīḥ prāṇaḥ pūrayate śanais
pratarpayanti sampūrṇāḥ tāḥ ca deham samantataḥ
yogiyājñavalkye
samāna vāyunā sārddham rasam sarvāsu nāḍiṣu
vyāpayan śvāsa rūpeṇa dehe carati mārutaḥ
vyomarandhraiḥ ca navabhiḥ viṣ mūtrāṇām visarjanam
kurvanti vāyavaḥ sarve śarīreṣu nirantaram
niśvāsa ucchāsa kāsāḥ ca prāṇa karma samīritāḥ
apāna vāyoḥ karma etat viṣ mūtra ādi visarjanam
prāṇa apāne ca ceṣṭā ādi vyāna karma iti ca iṣyate
udāna karma tat ca uktam dehasya unnayana ādi yat
poṣaṇa ādi samānasya śarīre karma kīrtitam
udgāra ādi guṇaḥ yaḥ tu nāga karma samīritam
nimīlana ādi kūrmasya kṣu tṛṣṇā kṛkarasya ca
devadattasya vipra indri jṛmbhā karma iti kīrtitam
dhanañjayasya poṣa ādi sarvam karma prakīrtitam
vāyūnām snātha ādīni agre vakṣyante
iti śukra śoṇita ādi utpatti kathanam
mātuḥ ambu vahā nāḍī nanu viddhā para abhidhā
nābhi stha nāḍīgarbhasya mātrā kṛta rasa āvahāḥ iti
śāktānandataraṅgiṇyām
kalanam ca eka rātreṇa vudvudam pañcame dine
śoṇitam daśa rātreṇa māṃsa piṇḍam caturdaśe

original: mārīyaṃ nāma yogotthaṃ pauruṣaṃ kārmaṇaṃ malam |
analyzed: mārīyam nāma yoga uttham pauruṣam kārmaṇam malam
āṇavam nāma samproktam militam tat mala dvayam
sūkṣma rūpāṇi tattvāni caturviṃśa mala dvaye
tatra yogam prakṛtyā āśu tatas tu garbha mārutaḥ
saṅkṣobhya saṃvarddhayati ityādi pūrva uktena anvayaḥ
svagataiḥ marut agni adbhiḥ klidyate kvāthyate ca tat
miśrībhūtam tat ahnā eva mātuḥ aṅguṣṭha sammitam
sammitam iti mātuḥ aṅguṣṭha nakha parimitam iti arthaḥ
rāghavabhaṭṭa dhṛta yogārṇave
ghana māṃsam ca viṃśa ahe piṇḍa bhāva ula pakṣitam

śāktānande tu
māsa ekena tu pūrṇena māṃsa piṇḍa uṅkurāyate
iti uktam tatra eva
ādau sañjāyate bījam brahmāṇḍam sahasā aṅkuraḥ
tasya madhye sumeruḥ ca kaṅkāla daṇḍa rūpadhṛk
cara acarāṇām sarveṣām deva ādīnām viśeṣataḥ
ālayaḥ sava bhūtānām meroḥ abhyantare pi ca
pradīpa kalikā ākāraḥ jīvaḥ hṛdi sadā sthitaḥ
rajju vaddhaḥ yathā śyenaḥ gataḥ upi ākṛṣyate punar
guṇavat haḥ tathā jīvaḥ prāṇa apānena kṛṣyate
yogiyajñavalkye dvitīya adhyāye tu
tad madhye nābhiḥ iti uktam nābhau cakra samudbhavaḥ
dvādaśa ara yutam tat ca tena dehaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
cakresmin bhramate jīvaḥ puṇya pāpa praṇoditaḥ
tantu pañjara madhya sthaḥ yathā bhramati lūtikaḥ
lūtika urṇanābhaḥ mākarasā yasya prasiddhiḥ
nābhau jīvasya bhramaṇa mātram sthiti sthānan tu hṛdayam eva
tena pūrva vacane na vivādaḥ
māsa dvaye tu sampūrṇe śiraḥ medaḥ prajāyate

original: majjāsthi ca tribhirmāsaiḥ keśastvak ca caturthake |
analyzed: majja asthi ca tribhiḥ māsaiḥ keśaḥ tvac ca caturthake

original: eṣu māseṣvadhyātmaviveke tu viśeṣa ukto yathā |
analyzed: eṣu māseṣu adhyātma viveke tu viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ yathā
drava tvam prathame māse kalala ākhyam prajāyate
dvitīye tu ghanaḥ piṇḍaḥ peśīṣṭa ghana sarvudam
pum strī napuṃsakānām tu prāc avasthāḥ kramāt imāḥ
tṛtīye tu aṅkurāḥ pañca kara ādi śirasaḥ matāḥ
atra grantha traye yat bheda trayam aṅkura utpatteḥ uktam
tat śarīram eru avayava aṅkura bhedena aviruddham āmnāya bhedena vā
aṅga pratyaṅga bhāgāḥ syuḥ sūkṣmāḥ ca yugapad tadā

atas mātuḥ manaḥ bhīṣṭam kuryāt garbha samṛddhaye

garbhasya vyaṅga tā ādayaḥ
mātuḥ ced viṣaya alābhaḥ tadā ārttaḥ jāyate sutaḥ

original: māhiṣeṇa tu raktākṣaṃ lomaśaṃ sūyate sutam |

pārṣṇi bhāgena sampīḍya yonim ākuñcayet gudam
apānam ūrddhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandhaḥ nigadyate
atha yonimudrā kubjikātantre ṣaṣṭha paṭale
atha vakṣye maheśāni śārada indu nibha ānane

original: atīva paramaṃ devi ! na prakāśyaṃ kadācana |
analyzed: atīva paramam devi na prakāśyam kadācana
na prakāśyam idam devi svayoniḥ ivam pārvati
niśīthe mukta keśaḥ tu nagnaḥ śakti samanvitaḥ
cintayet iṣṭadevīm ca yoginām yoga rūpiṇīm
guhya deśe vāma pāda gulpham saṃyojayet sudhīḥ

original: p. 129) śarīrañca sthirīkṛtya jihvāyāṃ tālukaṃ nyaset |
analyzed: śarīram ca sthirīkṛtya jihvāyām tālukam nyaset
nāsā agram netra yuktam ca kartavyam ca maheśvari
kaṇṭhāsanam tathā kṛtvā cintayet ūrddhva vāhinīm
bhujaṅga rūpiṇīm devīm mūlādhāra nivāsinīm
prātar ādhāra kamale hutabhuj maṇḍala upari
catur bhujām mahā devīm parama amṛta vṛṃhitām
śyāma varṇām mahādevīm mahā padmāsana sthitam
abhayañca varañca eva dakṣiṇe dhāriṇīm sadā
khaḍgam muṇḍam ca vāme smin dhārayantīm sanātanīm
muktakeśīm smita mukhīm śmaśāna ālaya vāsinīm
danturām dakṣiṇa vyāpti muktakeśīm digambarīm
śavānām kara saṅghātaiḥ kṛta kāñcīm hasat mukhīm
lambamānām muṇḍa mālām dhārayantīm sadāśivām
śavasya hṛdaye ca eva dakṣa pāda niṣevitām
mahākālena rati artham atyanta lālasā parām
candra sūrya vahni rūpa nayanatraya saṃyutām
arddhacandra dharām devīm pīna unnata payodharām
śivābhiḥ ghora rāvābhiḥ catur dikṣu samanvitām
catur vedaiḥ apārān ca sarva veda vibhūṣitām
kāma dām kāmarūpān ca bhaktānām trāṇa kāriṇīm
svādhiṣṭhāne mahādevīm cintayet indu rūpiṇīm
tatra devīm ca sañcintya nirmalam viśva rūpiṇam
abhayam vara dam ca eva hastam ca surasundari
dhanuḥ vāṇa dharām devīm pāśa aṅkuśa dharām punar
vāṇa liṅga samāyuktām nīla megha ānana prabhām
lalat jihvām mahādevīm viṣṇu rūpām sanātanīm
bāla yugma lasat karṇām duṣṭa asura nisūdinīm
vyāghra carma parīdhānām brahmarandhra nivāsinīm
ati prasanna vadanām smera ānana saroruhām
maṇipūre cintayet tu tejaḥ puñjām sanātanīm
digambarīm karāla āsyām muktakeśīm catur bhujām
rakta varṇām mahādevīm rakta vastra vidhāriṇīm
padma āsanām mahā devīm sarva nāga vibhūṣitām
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma dhāriṇīm sura pūjitām
dharma artha dāyinīm devīm bhaktānām trāṇa kāriṇīm

original: p. 130) sarvasiddhipradāṃ devīṃ jagatāṃ mohinīṃ punaḥ |
analyzed: sarva siddhi pradām devīm jagatām mohinīm punar
mahāmāyām mohinīm ca jñāninām jñāna dām satīm
sundarīm ramaṇīm rāmām catuvarga phalaṃpradām
śāntām śānta priyām ugrām ugra daitya vināśinīm
madhu māṃsa priyām kṛṣṇām yaśodānanda kāriṇīm
bhakti gamyām mahādevīm mahākāla nivāsinīm
sarveṣām jananīm nityām cintanyet sura pūjitām
anāhate mahādevi cintayet para devatām
aṣṭa bhujām mahādevīm rakta varṇām tri śaktikām
dhanuḥ vāṇam ca khaḍgam ca cakram ca dadhatīm śive
pāśa aṅkuśa dharām devīm brahma ādi sura vanditām
arddhacandra dharām devīm pīna unnata payodharām
padma āsanām mahāmāyām mahā padmāsana sthitām
evam sañcintayet devīm brahma mārgeṇa gāminīm
viśuddhe tu mahācakre cintayet parameśvarīm
daśa bhujām mahādevīm pīta varṇām sanātanīm

original: kapālaṃ kheṭakaṃ śaṅkhaṃ darpaṇaṃ cāmaraṃ tathā |
analyzed: kapālam kheṭakam śaṅkham darpaṇam cāmaram tathā
dakṣiṇe bibhratīm devīm kāmarāja upari sthitām
vāme khaḍgam mahāpadmam karttṛkam pāśam aṅkuśam
dhārayantīm mahādevīm mahā siṃhāsana sthitām
divya vastra parīdhānām jaṭā mukuṭa maṇḍitām
brahma viṣṇu mahādeva vanditām surasundarīm
ājñācakre maheśāni dvi bhujām cintayet sudhīḥ
siṃha skandha samārūḍhām dvi bhujām su manoharām
vara abhayam dadhānām ca nānā maṇi vibhūṣitām
jaṭā mukuṭa saṃyuktām arddhacandra vibhūṣitām
ratna kāñcī samāyuktām ratna mālā vibhūṣitām
rakta vastra parīdhānām kamalāpati sevitām
suṣumnā vartmanā devīm cintayet vyāla rūpiṇīm
ṣaṣ cakra bheda yogena cintayet parameśvarīm
sahasrāra dale ca eva cintayet parameśvarīm
kāmam bhramantam tad madhye pañca vāṇa vibhūṣitam
gaṅgā ādi sarva tīrtham ca amṛtam prati cakrake
vasanta ādi mahādevi sarva ṛttu pariśobhitam
śveta varṇam mahādevi sahasra dalam uttamam
sarva deva samāyuktam sarva śakti samanvitam
sarva mantra mayam devi catur veda vibhūṣitam
ekādaśa mahādevām brahma viṣṇu śiva ātmikām
karṇikām svarṇa varṇām ca tatra devam vicintayet
cit mayam para śivam devi dhyāna gamyam sanātanam

original: sārātsārataraṃ parādapi paraṃ cetovaco'gocaram nityānandanirantaraṃ nirūpamaṃ
analyzed: sārāt sārataram parāt api param cetaḥ vacaḥ gocaram nitya ānanda nirantaram
vedaiḥ apāram param
śiva śakti mayam devi nirguṇam sa guṇa ātmakam
pradīpa kalikā ākāram yoginām dhyāna rūpinam
caitanya rūpiṇam devam parama amṛta vṛṃhitam
tad madhye cintayet devīm triguṇām ca sanātanīm
ghora daṃṣṭrām karāla āsyām lalat jihvām catur bhujām
kara ambujām
abhayam varadam ca eva dakṣiṇa adhas ūrddhva pāṇikām
nīla megha prabhām tanvīm ghora rūpām digambarām
kaṇṭha avasakta muṇḍa ālī galat rudhira carcitām
karṇa avataṃsa tām nīta śava yugma bhayānakām
bāla arka maṇḍala ākāra locana tritaya anvitām
sṛkka dvaya galat rakta dhārā visphurita ānanām
muktakeśīm smita mukhīm śmaśāna ālaya vāsinīm
śavānām kara saṅghātaiḥ kṛta kāñcīm hasat mukhīm
śava rūpa mahādeva hṛdaya upari saṃsthitām
mahākālena rati artham upaviṣṭām smara āturām
śivābhiḥ ghora rāvābhiḥ catur dikṣu samanvitām
ati prasanna vadanām smera ānana saroruhām
anāhataḥ tu tatra eva taḍit koṭi sama prabhām

original: tasyorddhve tu śikhā tanvi ! cidrūpā paramā kalā |
analyzed: tasya ūrddhve tu śikhā tanvi cit rūpā paramā kalā
tayā sahitam ātmānam evambhūtam vicintayet
gacchantīm brahmamārgeṇa liṅga bheda krameṇa tu
sūryya koṭi prabhā ākāram candra koṭi su śītalam
amṛtam tat hi saṃjña stham parama ānanda lakṣaṇam

original: gatvā kulākulāṃ divyāṃ punareva kulaṃ viśet |
analyzed: gatvā kulākulām divyām punar eva kulam viśet
evam abhyasyamānasya atyantasya iha niścayāt
jarā maraṇa duḥkha ādyaiḥ mucyate bhava bandhanāt

original: caturvidhā tu sā sṛṣṭistasyāṃ yonau pravarttate |
analyzed: caturvidhā tu sā sṛṣṭiḥ tasyām yonau pravarttate
mūlādhāra saroje tu tri koṇam su manoharam
kāmam bhramantam tad madhye bāla arka koṭi sannibham
tad ūrddhve kuṇḍalīm śaktim taḍit koṭi sama prabhām
suṣupta bhujaga ākārām sārddha tri balayā anvitām
a ropya āropya śaktim kamala jani layām ātmanā sākam eṣu sthāneṣu abja āsaneṣu
praṇihita hṛdayām cintayantīm krameṇa
nitya ānanda avasānam khaga mukula mahāpadma saṅgha antara sthām
dhyāyet caitanya rūpām abhinava jaladām mokṣa mārga eka mārgām
sākṣāt lākṣā rasa ābhām gagana gata mahāpadma saṃsthāt ca haṃsāt pītvā
divya amṛta ogham punar api ca viśet madhyadeśam kulasya
cakre cakre krameṇa amṛta rasa visaraiḥ tarpayet devatāḥ tāḥ ḍākinī ādyāḥ samastāḥ
sakala dala gatām tarpayet kuṇḍalīm tām
indraḥ tad ūrddhva bodhinyām nādenādaḥ tathā eva ca
śaktau punar vyāpikā aṃśam ā manum manu gocare
mantra akṣarāṇi cicchaktau protāni paribhāvayet
tām eva paramaḥ vyomni parama amṛta vṛṃhite
darśayet ātma sambhāvam pūjā homa ādikam vinā

original: evaṃ sañcintayenmantraṃ sa yogī nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: evam sañcintayet mantram sa yogī na atra saṃśayaḥ
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ iṣṭadevīm prapaśyati
ṣaṣ māse sarva siddhiḥ syāt ātmānam ca prapaśyati
aṣṭādaśa mahāsiddhiḥ vatsara ante bhaviṣyati
evam sañcintayet devīm paramātma svarūpiṇīm

original: sa eva śaṅkaraḥ sākṣāt sa eva viṣṇuravyayaḥ |
analyzed: saḥ eva śaṅkaraḥ sākṣāt saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: sa eva paramaṃ brahma sa eva devatottamaḥ ||
analyzed: saḥ eva paramam brahma saḥ eva devatā uttamaḥ

original: iti te kathitā devi ! yonimudrā maheśvari ! |
analyzed: iti te kathitā devi yonimudrā maheśvari

original: vatsareṇa labhet siddhiṃ pūrṇakāmaḥ labhet punaḥ |
analyzed: vatsareṇa labhet siddhim pūrṇa kāmaḥ labhet punar
śrī pārvatī uvāca
aśaktāḥ yonimudrāyām hīna buddhi narāḥ kalau

original: vihitaṃ sādhane śaktau kathaṃ yānti parāṃ gatim ||
analyzed: vihitam sādhane śaktau katham yānti parām gatim
sadāśivaḥ uvāca
sādhu pṛṣṭam mahādevi jantūnām hita kāriṇi
yonimudrām maheśāni karttum na śakyate

original: māyayā vā śriyā vāpi kāmena praṇavena vā ||
analyzed: māyayā vā śriyā vā api kāmena praṇavena vā
sampuṭam mūlamantram tu japet aṣṭa sahasrakam

vargaḥ
